name: Saving Spaceman Sam
description:
Spaceman Sam is wounded but the escape pod has no fuel! You, as a robot, must find said fuel in order to get him home and save his life.

A platformer heavily inspired by the likes of Jet Set Willy, where you must traverse a large game world and collect a series of items (in this case barrels of fuel).

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Space to jump
  • Tab to bring up a status menu
